Role: MAK Media Solutions (2011â€“2012)

At MAK Media, Jof Davies served as a technical and creative lead across web, IT, video, and CRM functions. Responsibilities included directing and editing video content, recording promotional media, building websites, and managing custom CRM implementations.

Key competencies demonstrated:
- Multi-camera recording and editing
- CMS management including WordPress, Squarespace, and Drupal
- CRM setup, configuration, and training stakeholders
- Small-business IT management involving hosting, DNS, email, telephony, and technical troubleshooting

This role established Jof as a hybrid AV-IT professional capable of managing end-to-end digital production and technical systems delivery.
